title: Post your Lunar Revel Shop!
body:
Not loving mine at all... might buy the Leona & Sivir ones but that's about it for me. What about you guys? Score anything good? Let me see!

Update... suddenly Rengar is no longer on sale for me and Pool Party Dr. Mundo is. Interesting bug.

http://prntscr.com/9w83p2

replies.body:
Mine was even worse than my snowdown one (and i didn't buy anything from that either) Posting both for comparison....

http://imgur.com/6N1wqR4  http://imgur.com/l7dqvfh

I'm just going to stop opening the windows on these....it's a huge gallery of disappointment each time.
I think they REALLY want you to buy Elderwood Bard

> [{quoted}](name=Woodsy2575,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-29T00:07:17.578+0000)
>
> I think they REALLY want you to buy Elderwood Bard

If a better skin for him didn't come out right before this happened then sure.

These are all champions that I play and enjoy very much!

Because I already own skins for them. Better, more expensive skins, in most cases.

So yay?

http://imgur.com/4qfWXCV

Mine was..._better_...than last time I guess. On the plus side I didn't get multiple skins for the same champion this time (last time I had 2 Gragas and 2 Naut skins -_- ).  But on the other hand 5/6 skins were for champs I already had skins for (I guess also an improvement from 6/6 last time...). /sigh Also i'm still not impressed with the sub 50% sales, especially for skins that are very very old. you're better off just waiting for a normal sale unless you just really can't wait.

I got.

Woad Ashe - I don't have an Ashe skin but I don't much like this one anyway.
Warden Sivir - I have Victorious.
Subterranean Nautilus - I have Astronautilus.
Scarlet Hammer Poppy - I have Ragdoll Poppy.
Oktoberfest Gragas - I have Superfan Gragas.
Spirit Fire Brand - I have Zombie Brand.

> [{quoted}](name=exe3,realm=OCE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-01-29T07:53:35.908+0000)
>

> Spirit Fire Brand - I have Zombie Brand.

At least you got something new :/ I'd have liked the gragas skin

It's only a measly 20% off though.

I'd have also liked the Gragas skin admittedly had I not gotten Superfan from a free mystery gift thing though again, only 40% off.

add another to elderwood bard.
http://i.imgur.com/HvGFpCF.png
riot: pls buy elderwood bard

I just opened my shop again and the window with battle regalia poppy was closed........

http://imgur.com/1DrxWrT

Idk if it's a bug or what but.....runeguard voli is in february's sale schedule and I was already planning to get that.

Edit: I just noticed battle regalia poppy is on that list too....lol.

 Thanks anyway mysterious bug....you were close. 

> [{quoted}](name=Vicvictorw,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-29T00:54:28.497+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/RXzyiza.png[/img]
> 
> Eh. Might pick up MF's skin.

 The MF, Cait, and Soraka skins are all great....I like yours.....in fact  that whole selection is arguably pretty awesome if El Tigre weren't on sale this coming month.

I would pick those three up...or at least most definitely the MF one (Lunar Wraith and Reaper exist and might be your thing instead of the other two).
OMG. Same thing just happened to me. I clicked on the shop and the Rengar one was closed. I reoponed it and it's Pool Party Mundo now. WTF?

"Mine was even worse than my snowdown one (and i didn't buy anything from that either) "
- same as Spork

Steel Legion Garen 20%
Golden Alistar 30%
Rageborn Mundo 30%
Dragonslayer Braum 40%
Warrior Princess Sivir 70%  (really?  this skin for 70%... complete fail Riot)
AstroNautilus 40%

Not buying any of these nor do I ever intend to.  Riot just doesn't know what skins I want (aside from the fact I already have Warden Sivir - huge improvement from the skin offered - and Rugged Garen, just simply the best splash imo for Garen).

> [{quoted}](name=Yasu Yoru,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-28T21:31:17.572+0000)

> Warrior Princess Sivir 70%  (really?  this skin for 70%... complete fail Riot)

atleast it's not as bad as the ones who got assassin master yi for 70% off on snowdown.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasu Yoru,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-28T21:31:17.572+0000)
>
> "Mine was even worse than my snowdown one (and i didn't buy anything from that either) "
> - same as Spork
> 
> Steel Legion Garen 20%
> Golden Alistar 30%
> Rageborn Mundo 30%
> Dragonslayer Braum 40%
> Warrior Princess Sivir 70%  (really?  this skin for 70%... complete fail Riot)
> AstroNautilus 40%
> 
> Not buying any of these nor do I ever intend to.  Riot just doesn't know what skins I want (aside from the fact I already have Warden Sivir - huge improvement from the skin offered - and Rugged Garen, just simply the best splash imo for Garen).

 That 40% on astronautilus is...ok I guess?

 I'm with you on the 70% off misplacement though.....it's always on something absurdly cheap.

 I saw some people getting crap like battle boss blitzcrank or guardian of the sands xerath at -70%....sometimes in the same sale....just makes you feel so cheated

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=XAvHEMfb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-28T22:44:38.181+0000)
>
> These are all champions that I play and enjoy very much!
> 
> Because I already own skins for them. Better, more expensive skins, in most cases.
> 
> So yay?
> 
> http://imgur.com/4qfWXCV

Also this... I already own the legendary skins for each champ featured in both of my sales as well as another skin for all of them except sion (who quite frankly needs a new one after his rework...they all look goofy on his new model).  I WAS hoping for a new poppy skin (ragdoll pls...) since I happened to have the only one that doesn't let me see her face after all the work they put into it.....but if I really wanted THAT particular one (I don't) I'd rather wait for a real sale instead of 30%

http://i.imgur.com/RXzyiza.png[/img]

Eh. Might pick up MF's skin.
Got Arclight Vayne for 70% off so I can't complain.
